data.title: Oklafan.com v5 Beta > Bios > Nightmare [1st]
data.text:
Bios

Nightmare [1st]

Height: 6' 4"

Weight: 290 lbs

From: Parts Unknown

Birthday: May 2nd

Pro Debut: 1974

Aliases: Randy Colley, Moondog Hawkins, Moondog Rex, The Masked Champion, Smash of Demolition, Detroit Demolition, Deadeye Dick, Randy The Mountaineer, Assassin 2 Mk 2, Pizza Face, Jack Dalton, Rip Tyler, Randy Collins, The Executioner, Shadow #1, Ripper Hawkins, Spoiler #2, Randy Jones, Ripper Hawkins, The Moondogk, Big Bear Colley, Dr. X

Feds Worked For: MSW, NWA-West, NWA, USWA, WCW, WWF, WWWF, Catch Wrestling Association (Germany), Championship Wrestling from Florida (FL), Continental Championship Wrestling (AL/TN), Continental Wrestling Association (AL/TN), CWF, Georgia Championship Wrestling (GA), Gulas Wrestling Enterprises (TN), Gulf Athletic Club (TX), International Championship Wrestling (KY/TN), IWA Mid-South (IL/IN), Japan Wrestling Association (Japan), M & M Promotions (NM/TX), Maple Leaf Wrestling (Canada), Mid-Atlantic Championship Wrestling (NC/SC), New Japan Pro Wrestling (Japan), NWA Big Time Wrestling (TX), Smoky Mountain Wrestling (KY/NC/SC/TN/VA/WV), South Atlantic Pro Wrestling (NC/SC/VA), Southeast Championship Wrestling (AL/TN), St. Louis Wrestling Club (MO), Stampede Wrestling (Canada), Tennessee Independent Wrestling Federation (TN), World Wrestling Council (Puerto Rico)

Signature Moves: Backbreaker

Career Highlights: -AWA Southern Tag Team Champion (5x; 5 w/ Assassin #2, 1 w/ Moondog Spot)

-HCW Tag Team Champion (w/ Steve Morton)

-MSW Mid-South Tag Team Champion (w/ Eddie Gilbert)

-MSW North American Champion

-NWA Georgia Tag Team Champion (2x; both w/ Assassin #1)

-NWA Gulf Coast Tag Team Champion (w/ Jim Dalton)

-NWA (Southeast) Continental Tag Team Champion (w/ Bob Carter)

-TIWF Tag Team Champion (w/ Moondog Mutt)

-USWA World Tag Team Champion (3x; all w/ Moondog Spot)

-WWC Caribbean Tag Team Champion (w/ Moondog Spot)

-WWC North American Tag Team Champion (2x; both w/ Moondog Spot)

-WWC Tag Team Champion (w/ Moondog Spot)

-WWF World Tag Team Champion (2x; 1 each w/ Moondog King and Moondog Spot)

Affiliates: Lou Albano, Oliver Humperdink, Awesome Kong, Dragon Master, Eddie Gilbert, Kamala, Leatherface, Moondog Cujo, Moondog Rover, Moondog Spot, Moondog Mutt, Moondog Spike, Moondog King, Black Bart, Dutch Mantell, Bob Carter, Jim Dalton, Assassin #2/A-Team #2/Roger Rhodes, Assassin #1/Kurt Von Hess, The Assassin, Shadow #2, Masked Superstar/Ax

Notable Feuds: Tony Garea, Rick Martel, S. D. Jones, Rick McGraw, Dominic DeNucci, Bill Dundee, Robert Fuller, Paul Roma, Robert Gibson, Ricky Morton, Brad Armstrong, Mr. Wrestling II, Mike Rotundo, Jim Powers, Steve Keirn, Stan Lane, Tommy Gilbert, Pedro Morales, Koko B. Ware, Bobby Eaton, King Tonga/Haku, Ricky Gibson, Tony Charles, Ken Lucas, Tony Atlas, Steve Regal, Junkyard Dog/Stagger Lee, Tito Santana, The Tonga Kid/Tama, Tommy Rich, Dick Murdoch, Jake Roberts, Ron Bruise, Don Bruise, Wendell Cooley, Al Perez, Terry Taylor, Ted DiBoae, Steve Williams
